description: APIServerAdmissionConfiguration contains admission configuration for the Gardener API server

disableAdmissionPlugins.description: DisableAdmissionPlugins are a list of names of admission plugins that should be disabled although they are in the default enabled plugins list.

enableAdmissionPlugins.description: EnableAdmissionPlugins is a list of names of admission plugins to be enabled in addition to default enabled ones

mutatingWebhook.description: MutatingWebhook configures client-credentials to authenticate against validating webhooks

plugins.description: Plugins contains the name and configuration of admission plugins of the Gardener API server Mutating and Validating admission plugins must not be added. For more information, see here: https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/access-authn-authz/extensible-admission-controllers/#authenticate-apiservers#

validatingWebhook.description: ValidatingWebhook configures client-credentials to authenticate against validating webhooks
